definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: All of this polling makes for a lot of extra work.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些轮询都产生了许多额外的工作。

sentences.english: Moreover, the quick example only shows how to poll one time.
sentences.chinese: 此外，本文的示例仅展示了如何进行单次轮询。

sentences.english: In this article, I discuss various approaches that can be alternatives to polling.
sentences.chinese: 在这篇文章中，我将介绍多种可以替代轮询的方法。

sentences.english: Polling for the Status of an Asynchronous Operation.
sentences.chinese: 轮询非同步作业的状态。

sentences.english: The next section covers how to make the polling a bit more efficient.
sentences.chinese: 下一节说明如何改进轮询的效率。

sentences.english: This is implemented by associating a polling frequency with the cache.
sentences.chinese: 这可以通过将轮询频率与缓存相关联来实现。

sentences.english: The polling method may have delays due to response availability and polling cycle.
sentences.chinese: 由于响应可用性和轮询周期，轮询方法可能有延迟。

sentences.english: The polling method may have delays due to response availability and polling cycle.
sentences.chinese: 由于响应可用性和轮询周期，轮询方法可能有延迟。

sentences.english: This timer is a polling mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 这个定时器是一种轮询机制。

sentences.english: Adjust the job polling interval at the node, if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要，调整节点上的作业轮询间隔。

sentences.english: Polling is how most of us check our email.
sentences.chinese: 轮询就是我们大多数来检查邮件的方法。

sentences.english: The idea is that this is designed to give a hook that implementors can make cheap to poll.
sentences.chinese: 其思想是提供一个钩子供实现者进行低廉的轮询。

sentences.english: This method is timelier than the polling method and guarantees that the response is handled immediately.
sentences.chinese: 回调方法比轮询方法更及时，能确保响应被及时处理。

sentences.english: CFP, and the ability to retain polling for backward compatibility, result in more efficient polling.
sentences.chinese: CFP改道访问维轮询兼容性，带更效轮询。

sentences.english: CFP, and the ability to retain polling for backward compatibility, result in more efficient polling.
sentences.chinese: CFP改道访问维轮询兼容性，带更效轮询。

sentences.english: Dynamic limited polling protocol based on length of queue is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基于队长参数的动态限定轮询多址协议。

definition: to pass an argument (computing)/abbr. for 傳遞參數|传递参数[chuan2 di4 can1 shu4]
